grammary.title: in
grammary.content:
Country and Cities: in France, in Paris, in Poland, in Gliwice
Rooms: in the bedroom, in the kitchen, in the saloon
Buildings: in a shop, in a museum, in a super-market
Closed spaces - ograniczone/zamknięte powierzchnie in a park, in a garden, in a car
Months: in January, in Fabruary, in March, in April, in May, in June
Seasons: in winter, in spring, in summer, in autum
Years: in 1980, in 2000
Time of day: in the morning, in the afternoon, in the evening (not night - at night)

grammary.title: on
grammary.content:
Transport (na pokładzie): on a bike, on a bus, on train, on plane, on ship (not car - in a car)
Surface (na powierzchniach): on the floor, on a table, on a shelf, on the balcony, on the roof, on the wall
TIME: Dates (dokładne daty): on March 1st Days (dni tygodnia): on Monday, on Tuesday, on Wednesday, on Thursday, on Friday, on Saturday, on Sunday on Sunday morning, on Wednesday afternoon Days (dokładne dni świąteczne - nie okresy świąt): on New Year's Day. on Valentine's Day (okresy świąt: at Chrismas) Uwaga: on holiday

grammary.title: at
grammary.content:
W ściśle określonych miejscach (jedynych) bez the: at school, at home, at work, at university, at a party
at the (w okreśonych punktach): at the airport, at the station, at the door
Times: at 6 o'clock, at half past two at noon, at midnight, at sunset
Festival periods (okresy świąteczne): at Chrismass, at Easter, at the weekend
Uwaga: at night
